name: Bookworm Blunder
description:
Bookworms have invaded the library and made a mess of the stories!

Capture the bookworms while avoiding the bats, wolves, and the weird sisters!

This game is currently in early development and contains two maps: the forest outside of Dracula's castle and inside the castle.  The full game will feature more areas, characters, and puzzles.

Bookworm Blunder began as entry for the 2018 Indie Game Making Contest.

Controls

Arrow keys move your character.

The ESCape key brings up the in-game menu.

Windows System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Graphics: Open GL 2.0 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010) – The necessary files are included in the install process.
Credits

Game design and programming by Adam Biser.

Created using AppGameKit 2.
